class.rdfs:comment: An over the air or online broadcast event.
class.rdfs:label: BroadcastEvent

schema:broadcastOfEvent.rdfs:comment: The event being broadcast such as a sporting event or awards ceremony.
schema:broadcastOfEvent.rdfs:label: broadcastOfEvent

schema:isLiveBroadcast.rdfs:comment: True if the broadcast is of a live event.
schema:isLiveBroadcast.rdfs:label: isLiveBroadcast

schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:comment: Languages in which subtitles/captions are available, in [IETF BCP 47 standard format](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47).
schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:label: subtitleLanguage

schema:videoFormat.rdfs:comment: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).
schema:videoFormat.rdfs:label: videoFormat
